trends: There have been 6 other sightings in Newmarket
There were no other sightings in Newmarket on or around December 11th 2007
This sighting has never been favorited.
divs: sighting detailsdriving through my home town of newmarket last night i happened to notice an object in the sky, roughly s\sw of my position. i was less than 1\2 mile from my house and decided to continue home, but carried on glancing up at the object. once home i got out from my car and observed it for a few minutes and took a picture with my camera phone. it looked like a sphere on fire as it seemed to have flames coming from the top of it, although the whole thing looked like it was on fire. for a second i wondered if it might be the burner from a hot air balloon, but it was far too still, too small, not travelling in any noticeable direction and it was pitch black at this time of year. after a few minutes (3-4) it just faded away. i have never seen anything like this before and always been pretty sceptical of this type of event, however this was so unusual and has raised a few questions in my mind.
Summary: Motionless ball buring in the sky
